00014 class Columns_Mapper extends Common_Mapper
00015 {
00016     public static $instance;

00018     /**
00019      * @return void
00020      */
00021     function __construct()
00022     {
00023         parent::__construct();
00024         self::$instance =& $this;

00027     /**
00028      * Devuelve una instacia del mapper
00029      * @return Columns_Mapper
00030      */
00031     public static function get_instance()
00032     {
00033         if (self::$instance == null) {
00034             self::$instance = new Columns_Mapper();
00035         }
00036 
00037         return self::$instance;
00038     }

00040     /**
00041      * MÃ©todo para realizar busquedas de columnas
00042      *
00043      * @param array $where
00044      * @param integer $limit
00045      * @param integer $offset
00046      * @return Columns_Data array
00047      *
00048      * (non-PHPdoc)
00049      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Mapper#find()
00050      */
00051     public function find($where = array(), $limit = false, $offset = false)
00052     {
00053         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00054 
00055         if ($where instanceof Columns_Data) {
00056 
00057             $newWhere = array();
00058             foreach ($where->getExistingOptions() as $key => $value) {
00059 
00060                 if (!in_array($key, array("Errors","Plugins","Messages"))) {
00061                     $newWhere["userColumns.".$key] = $value;
00062                 }
00063             }
00064 
00065             $where = $where->getExistingOptions();
00066             $where = $newWhere;
00067         }
00068 
00069         $data = $this->_ci->db->select("userColumns.id, userColumnPlugins.idP as ucpid, identificador, `order`,
00070                 minimized,lastUserCheck,filters, userPlugins.idP, type, enabled")
00071               ->from('userColumns')
00072               ->where($where)
00073               ->join('userColumnPlugins', 'userColumns.id = userColumnPlugins.idc', 'left')
00074               ->join('userPlugins', 'userColumnPlugins.idP = userPlugins.id', 'left')
00075               ->order_by("`order` asc ,id asc, idP asc")
00076               ->limit($limit, $offset)
00077               ->get()->result_array();
00078 
00079         $items = array();
00080         
00081         foreach ($data as $item) {
00082 
00083             $cid = $item["id"];
00084             if (isset($items[$cid])) {
00085 
00086                 $column = $items[$cid];
00087 
00088             } else {
00089 
00090                 $column = new Columns_Data($item);
00091                 $column->setId($cid)
00092                        ->setIdU($auth->getUserId())
00093                        ->setIdentificador($item["identificador"])
00094                        ->setminimized($item["minimized"])
00095                        ->setLastUserCheck($item["lastUserCheck"]);
00096             }
00097 
00098             if (isset($item["idP"]) and $item["idP"] != "") {
00099 
00100                 $columnPluginData = new Columns_PluginsData();
00101                 $columnPluginData->setId($item["ucpid"])
00102                                  ->setIdC($cid)
00103                                  ->setIdP($item["idP"]);
00104     
00105                 $column->addPlugin($columnPluginData);
00106             }
00107 
00108             $items[$cid] = $column;
00109         }
00110 
00111         return $items;
00112     }
00113 
00114     /**
00115      * Devuelve todos las columnas en base de datos
00116      *
00117      * @return Columns_Data array
00118      *
00119      * (non-PHPdoc)
00120      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Mapper#fetchAll()
00121      */
00122     public function fetchAll()
00123     {
00124         $data = $this->_ci->db->get('userColumns')->result_array();
00125         $items = array();
00126 
00127         foreach ($data as $item) {
00128             $items[] = new Columns_Data($item);
00129         }
00130 
00131         return $items;
00132     }
00133 
00134     /**
00135      * Devuelve el nÃºmero de registros en base de datos
00136      *
00137      * @param array $where
00138      * @return integer
00139      */
00140     public function totalRows($where = array())
00141     {
00142         $this->_ci->db->select('count(*) as itemNum');
00143         return $this->_ci->db->where($where)->get('userColumns')->row()->itemNum;
00144     }

00146     /**
00147      * Crea o actualiza un registro en base de datos
00148      *
00149      * @param Columns_Data $column
00150      * @return bool | Columns_Data $column
00151      *
00152      * (non-PHPdoc)
00153      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Mapper#save()
00154      */
00155     public function save(Columns_Data $column = null)
00156     {
00157         if (!$column instanceof Columns_Data) {
00158 
00159             throw new Exception('Not a valid Columns_Data object');
00160         }
00161 
00162         if (!$column->isValid()) {
00163 
00164              throw new Exception('Incorrect data');
00165         }
00166 
00167         $data = array(
00168             'id' => $column->getId(),
00169             'idU' => $column->getIdU(),
00170             'identificador' => $column->getIdentificador(),
00171             'minimized' => $column->getMinimized(),
00172             'lastUserCheck' => $column->getLastUserCheck(),
00173             'filters' => serialize($column->getFilters()),
00174             'order' => $column->getOrder(),
00175             'type' => $column->getType()
00176         );
00177 
00178         $this->_ci->db->trans_start();
00179 
00180         if (null === ($id = $column->getId())) {
00181 
00182             unset($data['id']);
00183             $this->_ci->db->set($data);
00184             $this->_ci->db->insert('userColumns');
00185 
00186             $columnId =  $this->_ci->db->insert_id();;
00187 
00188         } else {
00189 
00190             $columnId =  $data['id'];
00191             $this->_ci->db->where('id', $data['id']);
00192             unset($data['id']);
00193             $this->_ci->db->set($data);
00194             $this->_ci->db->update('userColumns');
00195         }
00196 
00197         $columnPlugins = $column->getPlugins();
00198         $columnPluginMapper = Columns_PluginsMapper::get_instance();
00199         
00200         try {
00201 
00202              for ($i=0; $i < count($columnPlugins); $i++) {
00203 
00204                 if ($columnPlugins[$i]->getIdC() === null or $columnPlugins[$i]->getIdC() == "") {
00205 
00206                     $columnPlugins[$i]->setIdC($columnId);
00207 
00208                     if (!$columnPlugins[$i]->isValid()) {
00209 
00210                         throw new Exception('Incorrect ColumnPlugin data');
00211                     }
00212                 }
00213 
00214                 $columnPluginMapper->save($columnPlugins[$i]);
00215              }
00216 
00217         } catch (Exception $e) {
00218 
00219             $column->setError("form", $e->getMessage());
00220             $this->_ci->db->trans_rollback();
00221             return $column;
00222         }
00223 
00224         if ($this->_ci->db->trans_status() === FALSE) {
00225 
00226             $this->_ci->lang->load("errormessages");
00227             $column->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("sqlTransactionError"));
00228             $this->_ci->db->trans_rollback();
00229             return $column;
00230         }
00231 
00232         $this->_ci->db->trans_complete();
00233         return $columnId;
00234     }
00235 
00236     /**
00237      * Elimina registros en base de datos
00238      *
00239      * @param Columns_Data $column
00240      * @return bool
00241      *
00242      * (non-PHPdoc)
00243      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Mapper#delete()
00244      */
00245     public function delete(Columns_Data $column = null)
00246     {
00247         if($column == null) {
00248 
00249             throw new Exception("Invalid Columns_Data object");
00250         }
00251 
00252         $where = array(
00253             "id" => $column->getId()
00254         );
00255 
00256         $cPluginMapper = Columns_PluginsMapper::get_instance();
00257 
00258         foreach ($column->getPlugins() as $plugin) {
00259 
00260             $cPluginMapper->delete($plugin);
00261         }
00262 
00263         $this->_ci->db->where($where);
00264         $this->_ci->db->delete('userColumns');
00265         return true;
00266     }
